project_abstract.cdata: The Bugesera Est Gisaka - Migongo Mixed Farming and Rural Development Project for Rwanda will provide: (a) spraying equipment and insecticides for tsetse fly eradication; (b) field extension services and infrastructure; (c) construction and upgrading of access and feeder roads; (d) drinking water distribution systems for the human population and livestock; (e) improved social infrastructure, including schools and health centers; (f) two finishing ranches, expansion of an existing breeding ranch, and improved livestock marketing through establishment of stock routes and a pilot finishing ranch; (g) a research station and pilot irrigation scheme in northern Gisaka; and (h) technical assistance, including training and feasibility studies.
